name: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!
name_original: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!
description:
Step into the shoes of a young girl with big dreams in My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! This exciting puzzle game takes you on a journey of determination and hard work as you help Molly make her way through the world of telemarketing. With your guidance, Molly will learn the ins and outs of selling magazines and make her way to her ultimate goal, saving up enough money to make a big purchase.

In this unique deduction game, you will have the opportunity to test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge, and time management. Each call will be different, and it's up to you to figure out the right product to match each customer's desire. It's a challenging and rewarding experience that will put your skills to the test.
